Article Title: Shreyas Iyer latest update: Why India ODI vice-captain will remain in Sydney
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer (L) was injured after completing a running catch in the third ODI against Australia in Sydney. (AP)

Shreyas Iyer injury: Greenstone Lobo says Iyer got lucky, predicts comeback

Shreyas Iyer on social media.

Full BCCI statement as of 1 November on Shreyas Iyer:

Indian cricket star Shreyas Iyer has been discharged from the hospital after suffering a ruptured spleen and rib cage injury during the third ODI against Australia in Sydney.The 30-year-old vice-captain sustained the injury while attempting to take a catch of Alex Carey off Harshit Rana's bowling last Saturday, leading to hospitalisation and ICU treatment."The BCCI Medical Team, along with specialists in Sydney and India, are pleased with his recovery, and he has been discharged from the hospital today," said the Indian cricket board in a statement on Saturday morning.BCCI further clarified that the batter will remain in Sydney and recover. At a time when he feels better to fly, he will return home. Shreyas is not involved in the ongoing T20I series against Australia and his next assignment was due to be the ODIs against South Africa, which start on November 30.Earlier, Iyer had provided his first update since the injury through his social media accounts."I'm currently in recovery process and getting better, every passing day. I'm deeply grateful to see all the kind wishes and support I've received - it truly means a lot. Thank you for keeping me in your thoughts," Iyer posted on X and Instagram.The incident occurred when Iyer initially walked off the field with the physio's assistance after attempting the difficult catch.His condition later deteriorated as his vital parameters dropped, necessitating immediate hospital care.Medical tests revealed internal bleeding from a lacerated spleen, resulting in his admission to the ICU for close monitoring.The BCCI had confirmed on Tuesday that Iyer's condition had stabilised and he was moved out of intensive care."The injury was promptly identified, and the bleeding was immediately arrested. His condition is now stable, and he continues to be under observation. A repeat scan done on Tuesday, 28th October, has shown significant improvement, and Shreyas is on the road to recovery," the BCCI stated.Initial estimates suggested a three-week recovery period.Shreyas Iyer sustained a blunt injury to his abdomen while fielding during the third ODI against Australia on 25th October 2025, resulting in a laceration of his spleen with internal bleeding. The injury was promptly identified, and the bleeding was immediately arrested following a minor procedure. He has undergone appropriate medical management for the same.He is now stable and recovering well. The BCCI Medical Team, along with specialists in Sydney and India, are pleased with his recovery, and he has been discharged from the hospital today.The BCCI extends its heartfelt gratitude to Dr Kouroush Haghigi and his team in Sydney, along with Dr Dinshaw Pardiwala in India, for ensuring Shreyas received the best treatment for his injury. Shreyas will continue to stay in Sydney for follow-up consultations and will return to India once he is deemed fit to fly.
Article Summary: Shreyas iyer has been discharged from the hospital after suffering a ruptured spleen and rib cage injury during the third odi against australia in sydney. The 30-year-old vice-captain sustained the injury while attempting to take a catch of alex carey off harshit rana's bowling last saturday.

Article Title: Dropped from India squad, Abhimanyu Easwaran makes fresh Gautam Gambhir admission: 'Just like me'
Article Text:
Gautam Gambhir and Abhimanyu Easwaran

Gautam Gambhir press conference: On Rohit Sharma-Virat Kohli, Harshit Rana and Delhi pitch

Indian opener Abhimanyu Easwaran has praised head coach Gautam Gambhir 's influence on his batting technique. Gambhir is currently leading Team India in Australia for a five-match T20I series, where they trail 0-1 after two matches.Gambhir took charge as the national team's head coach in July. Under his leadership, India secured victories in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 at home and the Asia Cup in Dubai this year."It has been really advantageous for me because he has played at the highest level of cricket . He was a very successful cricketer, and he was an opening batter just like me. I have talked to him a lot about batting, and I have learned a lot. It has had a good impact. We practice in things that will be beneficial according to the surface. We talk about those things a lot," he told ANI.Gambhir established himself as one of India's leading opening batsmen from 2003 to 2016, forming a formidable partnership with Virender Sehwag . He amassed 10,324 runs in 242 international matches at an average of 38.95, including 20 centuries and 63 fifties in 283 innings.In his Test career spanning 2004-16, Gambhir played 58 matches, scoring 4,154 runs at an average of 41.95.His record includes nine centuries and 22 fifties, with a highest score of 206.Gambhir reached the pinnacle of Test rankings during 2008-09. He scored 1,861 runs in 13 Tests at an average of 77.54, with seven centuries and seven fifties, earning him the ICC Test Player of the Year award in 2009.His memorable 137 against New Zealand in Napier helped India secure a 1-0 series victory. In ODIs, he accumulated 5,238 runs in 147 matches between 2003-13, averaging 39.68 with 11 centuries and 34 fifties.Gambhir played a crucial role in India's 2011 World Cup victory. He was the tournament's sixth-highest run-scorer and second-highest for India, scoring 393 runs in nine innings at 43.66 with four fifties.His notable contribution included a match-winning 97 against Sri Lanka in the final at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium, helping India chase 275 and claim the World Cup after 28 years.Easwaran, who was part of India‚Äôs Test squad in England earlier this year but dropped ahead of the West Indies series, continues to await his Test debut despite impressive domestic cricket statistics for Bengal. He has scored 8,070 runs in 107 first-class matches at an average of 48.32, including 27 centuries and 33 fifties.
Article Summary: Gautam gambhir is currently leading team india in australia for a five-match t20i series. He took charge as the national team's head coach in july. Abhimanyu easwaran has praised gambhir's influence on his batting technique.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Atlanta Braves potentially eyeing $400 million Detroit Tigers superswtar to support deadly Chris Sale-Spencer Strider duo

What It Means for Atlanta

Thecould be preparing to make one of the biggest moves of the 2026 offseason, potentially acquiring. A trade for Skubal, whose projected market value hovers around $400 million, would form a dominant rotation trio alongside Chris Sale and Spencer Strider, instantly elevating the Braves‚Äô World Series aspirations.Heading into 2026, Atlanta Braves‚Äô front office - led by Alex Anthopoulos - is expected to focus heavily on both the bullpen and starting rotation. The bullpen remains the team‚Äôs most pressing concern after inconsistencies during key moments of the 2025 season.One key decision involves reliever Tyler Kinley, who emerged as one of the most reliable arms for the Atlanta Braves last year.‚ÄúSo far, he‚Äôs proved to be a steal. In 21 games pitched since coming to Atlanta, Kinley has a 0.41 ERA and a 0.73 WHIP over 22 innings of work. He‚Äôs averaging nearly a strikeout per inning as well. It was a low-risk gamble that brought high reward,‚Äù wrote SI‚Äôs Harrison Smajovits. (H/t: Sporting News)For just $6.5 million, the Braves have the opportunity to retain a quality late-inning option. If Kinley continues his impressive form, this decision could be one of the most cost-effective bullpen moves of the offseason.While bullpen reinforcements are vital, the Braves are reportedly eyeing a blockbuster trade for Tarik Skubal, one of MLB‚Äôs most dominant starting pitchers. Skubal has just one year of team control remaining, which could make him available if the Tigers look to maximize his trade value before free agency.HTHB‚Äôs Eric Cole highlighted the potential challenge and magnitude of the move: ‚ÄúOkay, this is the big one and also the toughest one to pull off. The Braves want starting pitching depth and there is a good chance that soon-to-be multiple Cy Young winning Tarik Skubal is available in the right trade.‚ÄùCole also suggested that a trade package similar to the one used to land Kyle Tucker last offseason could be a realistic starting point for negotiations.Here‚Äôs the revised and properly formatted table you asked for:While such a deal would come at a steep cost, the payoff could be enormous. Adding Skubal would immediately create one of the most fearsome pitching rotations in the league.If the Atlanta Braves were to acquire Skubal, their projected top three starters would be:1. Tarik Skubal ‚Äì Cy Young contender, elite left-hander2. Chris Sale ‚Äì Veteran ace with championship pedigree3. Spencer Strider ‚Äì Strikeout machine and franchise cornerstoneAtlanta would be a nightmare for opposing hitters thanks to this trio's ideal combination of power, experience, and left-right balance.For General Manager Alex Anthopoulos, landing Tarik Skubal would be a career-defining move - one that could be remembered for years in Atlanta Braves history. It would not only reinforce the team‚Äôs championship window but also address the long-term stability of the rotation as veterans age.Also read: MLB trade rumors: New York Mets predicted to land $150 million Philadelphia Phillies star to bolster team and title chances As Eric Cole summarized, this would be ‚Äúthe toughest one to pull off,‚Äù but it‚Äôs exactly the kind of bold decision that could make the Atlanta Braves unstoppable in 2026 and beyond. If Anthopoulos pulls the trigger, this could be remembered as the defining trade that set the stage for another Braves dynasty.
Article Summary: The atlanta braves are reportedly eyeing a blockbuster trade for detroit tigers ace tarik skubal. The team could be preparing to make one of the biggest moves of the 2026 offseason, potentially acquiring. A trade forskubal, whose projected market value hovers around $400 million, would form a dominant rotation trio.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHailee gotta sue‚Äù: Stephen A. Smith under fire after bizarre Hailee Steinfeld comment during Josh Allen segment triggers explosive fan outrage
Article Text:
Stephen A. Smith's comment about thinking of Hailee Steinfeld while watching Josh Allen during a First Take segment sparked significant backlash. Despite his clarification that he was referring to her talent, viewers criticized the remark as inappropriate and a distraction from football analysis, highlighting the importance of professional boundaries in sports commentary.

Fans believe Stephen A. Smith crossed a professional boundary and they said so immediately

THERE'S SOMETHING MISSING for the Bills üßê Stephen A.'s thoughts ahead of Chiefs matchup | First Take

Meanwhile, Josh Allen continues to build his new era with Hailee Steinfeld

ESPN‚Äôs First Take rarely goes quiet but Thursday morning‚Äôs segment ahead of Week 9‚Äôs Bills vs Chiefs matchup became one of those moments where a single line from Stephen A. Smith completely hijacked the conversation. Viewers have gotten used to fiery debates between Smith, Shannon Sharpe and the rest of the table, but this time the noise wasn‚Äôt about red-zone numbers or defensive matchups.It centered around one sentence involving Hailee Steinfeld . Smith wasn‚Äôt breaking down Buffalo‚Äôs red-hot offense. He wasn‚Äôt comparing Allen to Mahomes. He openly admitted that when he watches the reigning MVP, ‚ÄúEverytime I see him, I'm thinking about his wife, Hailee Steinfeld.‚Äù The Internet didn‚Äôt just pause, fans unloaded.Yes, Stephen A. Smith clarified himself. He said it was about Hailee Steinfeld's talent, not attraction, ‚ÄúWhat an actress,‚Äù he insisted, praising her performance in "Sinners" and calling her ‚Äúspecial.‚Äù But social media didn‚Äôt soften.Fans went straight to the comments, and their wording was brutal and unfiltered. One fan commented, ‚ÄúThinking about someone wife is diabolical.‚ÄùAnother wrote, ‚ÄúWild compliment of Allen's wife.‚Äù A third chimed in, ‚ÄúEvery time you hear Josh Allen you think about his wife lmaoo yoo and then tried to qualify it bc her acting stop it.‚Äù A fourth commented, ‚ÄúThe shout out to Josh Allen's wife was really weird.‚Äù A fifth wrote, ‚ÄúHailee gotta sue at this point. ‚ÄùThis wasn‚Äôt the fun kind of NFL banter. Fans argued that even with context, the comment created a misalignment Smith was reducing an MVP segment into a punchline about his spouse.Allen proposed to Steinfeld in November 2024. They married this past March. She has been a consistent stadium-side presence this season and his box score doesn‚Äôt lie: 1,560 passing yards, 12 TDs, 261 rushing yards, 5 rushing TDs through seven games.Allen recently said, ‚ÄúMaybe that I am more than a football player,‚Äù explaining how marriage reset his perspective. Sports talk culture loves a viral moment, but this one wasn‚Äôt the kind Smith wanted. Fans made one thing clear: the line between sports analysis and personal commentary still matters.Also Read: Is Hailee Steinfeld‚Äôs marriage to Josh Allen already hitting rough waters? Actress opens up about doubts and life beyond Hollywood fame
Article Summary: Stephen a. smith's comment about thinking of hailee steinfeld while watching josh allen sparked significant backlash. Despite his clarification that he was referring to her talent, viewers criticized the remark as inappropriate and a distraction from football analysis.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThose songs hit her hard‚Äù: Blake Lively reportedly crushed after hearing Taylor Swift‚Äôs new songs as Travis Kelce helps fuel album buzz
Article Text:
A reported rift between close friends Blake Lively and Taylor Swift is causing a stir, fueled by speculation surrounding Swift's new album. Fans are dissecting song titles and lyrics, believing they allude to Lively, intensifying rumors of a fallout. This alleged distance challenges the perception of Swift's seemingly unbreakable inner circle, raising concerns about professional repercussions for Lively.

The album rollout raises suspicion as fans attach meaning to specific tracks





Why this fracture hits different in celebrity culture





Hollywood friendships have always lived in a strange middle ground, they look unbreakable when cameras flash, yet they can shatter just as easily under the pressure of personal choices, creative control, and the public‚Äôs hunger to connect dots. That is why the reported rift between Blake Lively and Taylor Swift feels bigger than a typical celebrity cold patch.This isn‚Äôt a pair of distant acquaintances, this is a friendship that once looked bulletproof, from Swift becoming godmother to Lively‚Äôs children to their quiet but consistent show of support for each other during their heaviest career chapters. But since the release of Swift‚Äôs latest album The Life of a Showgirl, internet sleuthing and lyrics speculation has made their silent distance impossible to ignore.According to Radar Online, ‚ÄúBlake is devastated ‚Äì this isn‚Äôt something she can easily move past.‚Äù And that is where things become more layered. The speculation is not rooted in coincidence, Swift herself personally revealed titles like Ruin the Friendship and CANCELLED! on fianc√© Travis Kelce ‚Äôs New Heights podcast, which only intensified theories before a single track was heard.‚ÄúHearing those songs has hit her hard, and seeing people online convinced they‚Äôre about her just makes it even more painful,‚Äù the source added.Add to that, fans believe certain lines from ‚ÄúCANCELLED!‚Äù read like surgical references to Blake‚Äôs year tied to legal tension with Justin Baldoni. It doesn‚Äôt matter that Swift never names her, the public is convinced the arrows are labeled.This isn‚Äôt just about lyrics or an album cycle. This story is ripping at a cultural myth: that Swift‚Äôs inner circle is impenetrable. In a celebrity ecosystem where reputation is currency, Blake reportedly fears the professional splashback, because Swift‚Äôs silent distancing doesn‚Äôt stay silent for long.If this friendship is truly done, the end isn‚Äôt loud. It‚Äôs subtle, strategic, and eerily poetic.Also Read: Taylor Swift‚Äôs choreographer exposes her past struggles ‚Äî from stage anxiety to finding confidence with Travis Kelce by her side
Article Summary: A reported rift between close friends blake lively and taylor swift is causing a stir, fueled by speculation surrounding swift's new album. Fans are dissecting song titles and lyrics, believing they allude to lively. This alleged distance challenges the perception of swift's seemingly unbreakable inner circle.

Article Title: Max Scherzer's emotional World Series Game 7 standing ovation sparks retirement buzz as Blue Jays ace stuns Los Angeles Dodgers with vintage brilliance
Article Text:
Max Scherzer (Image via: IG/X)

Fans read between the lines as Max Scherzer‚Äôs classy salute stirs talk of a possible goodbye

A moment that defined more than the game

When the Toronto Blue Jays and Los Angeles Dodgers faced off in a winner-takes-all World Series Game 7, it wasn‚Äôt just the championship that stole attention ‚Äî it was Max Scherzer‚Äôs masterclass on the mound. Under the blinding lights of Rogers Centre, the Blue Jays ace showcased vintage brilliance, delivering 4.1 innings of sharp command, allowing only one earned run, and striking out three against a relentless Dodgers lineup. Every pitch, every gesture, felt like a man reliving the fire that built his legacy.As he finally handed the ball to his manager and made his slow walk back to the dugout, the stadium erupted. The standing ovation from the Blue Jays faithful was thunderous ‚Äî not just a tribute to his Game 7 heroics, but to years of unwavering competitiveness. Scherzer, composed yet visibly emotional, tipped his cap to the crowd ‚Äî a gesture that instantly set social media ablaze with speculation over whether this could be his final appearance on a World Series stage.Moments after that ovation, reactions flooded social platforms. ‚ÄúVery well done. The salute to the crowd was classy,‚Äù wrote @MrPerfectSonic, echoing the grace that defined Scherzer‚Äôs exit. ‚ÄúAn absolute legend,‚Äù said @JoeOnChain, while @MdgAndres10 wondered, ‚Äúanyone know if Max has hinted at retirement after this year?‚Äù The conversation wasn‚Äôt just about Scherzer‚Äôs World Series performance ‚Äî it was about what the moment meant.Was this his subtle farewell, or just a veteran soaking in one more defining night?Adding to the emotional wave, @Thecityismine_x shared a fan-favorite line: ‚ÄúAge is just a number when you‚Äôve got fire in your arm üî•‚öæ.‚Äù It summed up the mood perfectly ‚Äî a mix of nostalgia, admiration, and disbelief at how effortlessly Scherzer could still command the stage when it mattered most.In a championship series packed with tension, strategy, and star power, Scherzer‚Äôs exit became the emotional centerpiece of Game 7. It was a reminder that baseball‚Äôs greatest moments often exist beyond box scores ‚Äî in the small gestures that connect players and fans forever. Whether or not this truly marks the end of his illustrious journey, Scherzer‚Äôs Game 7 outing against the Los Angeles Dodgers was a performance for the ages ‚Äî one that blended legacy, emotion, and excellence in a way only he could.Also read: Shane Bieber‚Äôs wife Kara‚Äôs fiery reaction to Alejandro Kirk‚Äôs wife Sofia Castaneda‚Äôs World Series post sparks buzz among Blue Jays fans
Article Summary: Toronto blue jays ace max scherzer delivered a masterclass on the mound against the los angeles dodgers. After 4.1 innings of sharp command, he allowed only one earned run, and struck out three against a relentless dodgers lineup. The standing ovation from the blue jays faithful was thunderous ‚Äî not just a tribute to his game 7 heroics, but to years of unwavering competitiveness.

Article Title: Is Anthony Davis playing tonight? Dallas Mavericks star's status and injury update against Detroit Pistons (11-01-2015)
Article Text:
Anthony Davis might not play tonight (Image via NBA)

The Dallas Mavericks have to change their game plan as Anthony Davis‚Äô setback impacts their performance

Concern looms over Dallas as Anthony Davis‚Äô growing injury list threaten to shake the team

Anthony Davis is a remarkable player (Image via NBA)

Injuries have decimated the Dallas Mavericks, and things are getting worse. Six Mavericks players are listed on the injury report ahead of their Saturday game against the Detroit Pistons. D'Angelo Russell 's fitness is a major worry, and Anthony Davis has been confirmed to miss the game. Davis, the Mavericks' star power forward and center, will miss at least two games due to a mild left calf strain, the team announced Friday night.In a neutral-site matchup, the Dallas Mavericks and Detroit Pistons will play each other in Mexico City during the NBA regular season. As both sides want to demonstrate their abilities on a global scale, supporters anticipate a top-notch performance. However, the major question is, will Anthony Davis play?The Mavericks' two-game road trip will not feature Anthony Davis . When the team returns to Dallas, the star center will be reassessed after receiving a low-grade left calf strain diagnosis. He was hurt on Wednesday during the Mavericks' previous game against the Indiana Pacers.Additionally, the Dallas Mavericks said in a statement on Friday, October 31, that Davis will not play in the team's next two games, including Saturday night's game against the Detroit Pistons in Mexico City.After the Mavericks return from their trip to Mexico City, which includes games against the Detroit Pistons and the Houston Rockets, Davis will be reassessed. During the first quarter of Wednesday's game against the Indiana Pacers , the 32-year-old sustained the injury.Anthony Davis will be joined on the sidelines by three players. Due to a right knee strain, Dereck Lively II will miss his third straight game. His most recent game was on Wednesday when the Mavericks visited the Toronto Raptors.Due to bilateral Achilles tendinopathy, the ten-time All-Star was labelled as probable before the Pacers game. Nevertheless, the calf strain was ultimately identified. For Dallas, he has averaged 20.8 points and 10.2 rebounds early in the season.On Wednesday, October 29, Davis played just seven minutes before leaving early due to "left lower leg soreness." Before making his way to the locker room, he was observed holding the back of his left leg close to the heel.Due to a bruise to his left knee, star guard D'Angelo Russell is labelled as "questionable" as well. Against the Pacers, he played 20 minutes off the bench and finished with 14 points, two rebounds, and five assists.Additionally, Daniel Gafford's status was also upgraded to "questionable." He hasn't yet made his season debut and is recovering from a sprained right ankle. Dante Exum and Kyrie Irving will also continue to observe the action from a distance. Exum is dealing with a right knee injury, and Irving is recovering from a torn ACL in his left knee.Also read: Is Anthony Davis playing tonight vs the Oklahoma City Thunder? Latest update on the Dallas Mavericks star‚Äôs status (October 27, 2025)
Article Summary: Dallas mavericks star anthony davis will miss at least two games due to a mild left calf strain. He was hurt on wednesday during the mavericks' previous game against the indiana pacers. Davis will be joined on the sidelines by three players. Due to a right knee strain, dereck lively ii will miss his third straight game.

Article Title: ‚ÄúDoesn‚Äôt make a lot of sense‚Äù: Leon Draisaitl calls out referees over Mika Zibanejad‚Äôs controversial penalty in Oilers‚Äô OT loss
Article Text:
Leon Draisaitl questions penalty call on Mika Zibanejad after Oilers‚Äô OT loss (Image via: Getty Images)

Leon Draisaitl unhappy with referees‚Äô decision on Mika Zibanejad‚Äôs high-stick against Jack Roslovic



POST-RAW | Leon Draisaitl 10.30.25

Leon Draisaitl and Connor McDavid look to spark Oilers‚Äô comeback



The Edmonton Oilers‚Äô 4-3 overtime loss to the New York Rangers didn‚Äôt sit well with Leon Draisaitl , who questioned a key officiating decision that shifted the momentum late in the game. The controversy erupted when Rangers forward Mika Zibanejad high-sticked Jack Roslovic, leaving him bleeding on the ice. Despite clear contact, officials awarded only a two-minute minor penalty, sparking debate over the call.With the game tied 3-3, the Oilers went on a short power play that carried into overtime, but they couldn‚Äôt convert. Moments later, the Rangers scored the game-winner, handing Edmonton another frustrating defeat. What should have been a four-minute double minor became one of the night‚Äôs biggest talking points and Draisaitl didn‚Äôt hold back when asked about it afterward.‚ÄúNo, not sure. It doesn‚Äôt make a lot of sense, but yeah, it is what it is,‚Äù Draisaitl said postgame, clearly unhappy with the officials‚Äô explanation. His remarks echoed the feeling among Oilers fans, who believed the team was shortchanged in a pivotal moment. The decision not only cost Edmonton valuable time on the man advantage but also stalled their late-game momentum.Still, Draisaitl didn‚Äôt blame the referees entirely. He pointed out that turnovers and poor puck management were major factors in the loss.‚ÄúJust not clean enough with the puck. Turnovers just kind of turned the game a little bit. So yeah, just have to clean that up,‚Äù he admitted.The Oilers have now dropped three of their last five games, slipping to fourth in the Pacific Division with a 5-4-3 record. Despite standout performances from Draisaitl and Connor McDavid, Edmonton‚Äôs inconsistency and missed chances continue to hurt them. With McDavid and Draisaitl carrying the offensive load, Edmonton‚Äôs playoff hopes hinge on tightening their defensive structure and improving special teams efficiency. As they prepare for upcoming Western Conference matchups, the Oilers will need more discipline, sharper execution, and better focus to turn close games into wins.The Oilers‚Äô upcoming schedule offers little room for error, with back-to-back tests against tough Western Conference rivals. These matchups will serve as a true measure of Edmonton‚Äôs resilience after a string of frustrating results.A stronger defensive effort and improved puck management will be vital if the Oilers hope to reassert themselves as playoff contenders. With Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl leading the charge, Edmonton‚Äôs ability to generate consistent offense and limit costly turnovers could define their playoff push. With the season still young, Draisaitl and McDavid‚Äôs leadership will be key in steering the team back on track before early setbacks start to shape their campaign.Also Read: Ryan Kesler sexual misconduct case: Meet the wife standing strong by ex-NHL star amid the scandal
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers lost 4-3 to the new york rangers in overtime. Mika zibanejad high-sticked jack roslovic, leaving him bleeding on the ice. Despite clear contact, officials awarded only a two-minute minor penalty, sparking debate over the call.

Article Title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the Minnesota Timberwolves? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star‚Äôs injury report (November 1, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball. Image via: David Liam Kyle / NBAE via Getty Images

Charlotte Hornets

LaMelo Ball

LaMelo Ball‚Äôs Injury Update vs Minnesota Timberwolves (November 1, 2025)

Charlotte Hornets‚Äô Injury Challenges for Tonight‚Äôs Game (November 1, 2025)

What‚Äôs at Stake Tonight between the Charlotte Hornets and the Minnesota Timberwolves?

Theenter tonight‚Äôs matchup against the Minnesota Timberwolves facing a cloud of uncertainty surrounding their star guard,. The 2025-26 NBA season hasn‚Äôt started the way Hornets fans hoped, with injuries piling up across the roster and Ball‚Äôs recurring ankle issues once again becoming a major concern. As the Hornets prepare for the first night of a back-to-back set, all eyes are on Ball‚Äôs availability - a decision that remains a game-time call.The Timberwolves, meanwhile, arrive in strong form, adding even more pressure on a Hornets squad struggling to find consistency. For Charlotte, this game represents more than just another early-season contest; it‚Äôs an opportunity to gauge the team‚Äôs resilience without its key playmaker. Fans have grown anxious over Ball‚Äôs long-term health, especially after his latest injury scare reignited worries about the durability of his right ankle.The latest reports confirm that LaMelo Ball is officially listed as questionable for tonight‚Äôs game against Minnesota due to a right ankle impingement. This particular injury has been a recurring issue for Ball, who has battled multiple ankle setbacks in recent seasons.The team‚Äôs coaching and medical staff are expected to make a final decision closer to tip-off, balancing his competitive desire to play with the long-term risk of aggravation. Given that this is the first game of a back-to-back series, caution will likely be a major factor in their choice.Ball has expressed frustration with his injury struggles but remains determined to return to full strength. His presence not only elevates the Hornets‚Äô offensive rhythm but also boosts the team‚Äôs confidence and energy on the floor. Losing him, even temporarily, has proven costly for Charlotte in the past. The Hornets are currently dealing with several injury setbacks beyond Ball‚Äôs situation. Brandon Miller remains out with a shoulder injury, Josh Green is recovering from shoulder surgery, and Grant Williams is sidelined due to a knee issue. These absences have forced head coach Charles Lee to make creative lineup adjustments while leaning heavily on the team‚Äôs bench depth.If Ball is unable to play, Tre Mann is expected to step in as the starting point guard. The likely starting lineup could include Mann, Sion James, Kon Knueppel, Miles Bridges, and Ryan Kalkbrenner. Coach Lee has also praised Collin Sexton‚Äôs scoring ability off the bench, noting that his presence can help balance the offense and keep the Hornets competitive even without their star guard.LaMelo Ball‚Äôs status has major implications for the Hornets‚Äô performance against the Timberwolves. His ability to control tempo, facilitate plays, and score efficiently makes him the team‚Äôs heartbeat. However, the fact that he hasn‚Äôt been ruled out entirely offers hope that he could suit up if he feels comfortable during warm-ups.As Charlotte continues to battle through an injury-heavy stretch, their adaptability and depth will be tested once again. Whether or not Ball plays tonight, the Hornets will need to rally together and find ways to compete against a tough Minnesota squad hungry for another win.Also read: Why is Anthony Edwards not playing tonight vs the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Minnesota Timberwolves star guard‚Äôs injury report (November 1, 2025) In short, fans should prepare for a game-time decision on LaMelo Ball. While his participation remains uncertain, optimism persists that the Hornets‚Äô young leader may make his return - provided his ankle allows it.
Article Summary: Lamelo ball is officially listed as questionable for tonight‚Äôs game against minnesota due to a right ankle impingement. Article Title: ESPN analyst Ryan Clark hits out at Jeff Landry over LSU Charlie Kirk statue debate

ESPN analyst Ryan Clark hits out at Jeff Landry over LSU Charlie Kirk statue debate (Image Via Getty)

First, Landry declared that athletic director Scott Woodward would not choose the next LSU football coach and that the governor would rather let Donald Trump pick the hire himself.Then, Jeff Landry publicly backed a plan to erect a statue on the LSU campus of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, a move Clark labelledandClark, a Louisiana native and former LSU and NFL player, spoke onabout both issues, making clear he believes the governor has overstepped his role.During the Wednesday edition of First Take, Clark turned his focus first on Landry‚Äôs statue proposal for Charlie Kirk at LSU‚Äôs campus.He argued that Kirk ‚Äúdoesn‚Äôt represent the people of Louisiana, doesn‚Äôt represent the players and the students at LSU, doesn‚Äôt represent the executives that work there.‚ÄùRyan Clark labelled that statement, the statue idea asadding that Landry‚Äôs second mistake was trying to block Scott Woodward from picking the next football coach.Jeff Landry‚Äôs suggestion came during an event at LSU, where he said he wouldRyan Clark said the plan felt like a political stunt rather than a meaningful tribute.Clark said.Beyond the statue idea, Clark addressed the football side. He referenced Landry‚Äôs comments that Scott Woodward would not pick the next head coach for LSU, which came after the Tigers fired Brian Kelly following their poor start to the 2025 season.Ryan Clark defended Woodward, noting the athletic director had overseen hires of coaches like Kim Mulkey (women‚Äôs basketball) and Jay Johnson (baseball), both national-championship winners.In his view, the governor‚Äôs mic-grab was less about football and more about public attention.Clark said.Also Read: Andrew Tate Becomes New Misfits Boxing CEO After Old KSI Tweet Leads To Explosive Company Takeover ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs enough going on in the state of Louisiana that needs to be fixed for its constituents. I don‚Äôt need you tweeting on Saturday night about what‚Äôs going on at Tiger Stadium.‚ÄùHe also made clear his emotional connection: being an LSU alum and a Louisiana native, the issue is personal. Clark said:

Article Title: Is Luka Doncic playing tonight vs the Memphis Grizzlies? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star‚Äôs injury status (October 31, 2025)
Article Text:
Luka Doncic (Image via Getty)

Los Angeles Lakers

Luka Doncic

Luka Doncic‚Äôs Injury Timeline and Current Status vs Memphis Grizzlies (October 31, 2025)

Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô Performance Without Luka Doncic

How Luka Doncic Impacts the Lakers‚Äô Game Plan

Luka Doncic of the Los Angeles Lakers (Image via Getty)

The Challenge Ahead: Facing a Healthy Memphis Squad

Final Outlook: A Game-Time Decision That Could Define the Night

Theare set for an exciting NBA Cup showdown against the Memphis Grizzlies tonight, but all eyes are on one question - willfinally return to the lineup? With the Lakers eager to build momentum early in the season, Doncic‚Äôs availability could be the difference between victory and another test of depth for JJ Redick‚Äôs squad.Both the Lakers and the Grizzlies are off to competitive starts, and their clash in Memphis promises high-intensity basketball. For Los Angeles, having their superstar back could tip the scales, especially after a string of gritty performances without him. Fans across the league are eagerly refreshing injury updates as tip-off approaches, hoping to see Doncic‚Äôs name officially cleared to play.Luka Doncic, who has been out for the last three games, is officially listed as questionable for tonight‚Äôs October 31 contest against the Memphis Grizzlies . The Los Angeles Lakers star has been managing multiple injuries - a sprain in his left finger and a contusion to his lower left leg - both sustained during the Lakers‚Äô 124-119 win over the Minnesota Timberwolves on October 24. Despite being visibly in pain, Doncic showcased his trademark toughness by finishing that game, even requiring on-court treatment for his left hand.Since then, the Lakers have taken a cautious approach with their new franchise cornerstone. The team upgraded Luka Doncic‚Äôs status to questionable, indicating he‚Äôs making progress but remains a game-time decision. Head coach JJ Redick recently noted that while Doncic is ‚Äúvery close to returning,‚Äù the staff will prioritize long-term health over rushing him back too soon.A return in the next couple of games appears highly likely, even if he sits out tonight.In Luka Doncic‚Äôs absence, the Los Angeles Lakers have managed to stay competitive, going 2-1 in their last three games. Austin Reaves, in particular, has stepped up as a surprising leader, shouldering the offensive load with composure and confidence. His playmaking and perimeter shooting have kept the Lakers‚Äô offense fluid, while teammates like D‚ÄôAngelo Russell and Rui Hachimura have provided valuable support on both ends of the court.JJ Redick‚Äôs system has emphasized ball movement and defense, helping the Lakers stay afloat without their primary scorer. However, there‚Äôs no denying the void left by Doncic‚Äôs all-around brilliance. His ability to create shots, orchestrate plays, and deliver in clutch moments remains irreplaceable, and his return could reignite the Lakers‚Äô offensive rhythm.Before the injury setback, Luka Doncic was off to one of the most explosive starts of his career. Through his first two games, he averaged a staggering 46 points, 11.5 rebounds, and 8.5 assists - numbers that reflect his MVP-caliber influence. His combination of elite scoring and playmaking has transformed the Lakers‚Äô offense, giving them a dynamic edge few teams can match.If Doncic suits up tonight, expect the Los Angeles Lakers to reestablish their inside-out attack, leveraging his pick-and-roll chemistry with Anthony Davis and his ability to collapse defenses to free up shooters. Conversely, if he remains out, the Lakers will rely heavily on Reaves and Russell to initiate plays while leaning on their defensive identity to keep the Grizzlies contained.The Memphis Grizzlies enter this contest with a 3-2 record and a mostly healthy lineup, posing a formidable challenge for the visiting Lakers. Their fast-paced, aggressive style - anchored by Ja Morant‚Äôs explosiveness and Jaren Jackson Jr.‚Äôs defensive versatility - makes them one of the toughest teams to beat at home. The Grizzlies‚Äô balanced scoring and energetic bench could exploit any rust the Lakers show if Doncic sits out again.Still, Los Angeles has shown resilience and adaptability, finding ways to win even without their top star. With a deep roster and a motivated locker room, they remain capable of pulling off an upset - especially if Reaves and Davis can replicate their recent form.As of now, Luka Doncic‚Äôs participation remains uncertain. The Los Angeles Lakers have listed him as questionable, and his return will likely depend on how he responds during pregame warmups. Even if he doesn‚Äôt suit up tonight, fans can take solace in the fact that his comeback is imminent - possibly within the next couple of games.Whether or not Doncic plays, tonight‚Äôs matchup between the Los Angeles Lakers and Memphis Grizzlies promises intensity, emotion, and elite basketball. A healthy Doncic would give the Lakers a major boost, but even in his absence, the team has proven capable of grinding out wins through collective effort and strong leadership from its supporting cast.Also read: Los Angeles Lakers vs Memphis Grizzlies regular season injury report: Who's playing, who's out, and more (October 31, 2025) All eyes will be on FedExForum as tip-off approaches. Los Angeles Lakers fans wait with bated breath, hopeful that Luka Doncic will make his long-awaited return and reignite Los Angeles‚Äô pursuit of early-season dominance.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers host the memphis grizzlies on october 31. Luka doncic has been out with a sprain in his left finger and a contusion to his lower left leg. He is officially listed as questionable for tonight's game. The lakers have gone 2-1 in his absence. The los angeles lakers host the memphis grizzlies at fedexforum.

Article Title: Why is Anthony Edwards not playing tonight vs the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Minnesota Timberwolves star guard‚Äôs injury report (November 1, 2025)
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards' injury report November 1, 2025 (Image via Getty)

Minnesota Timberwolves

Anthony Edwards

Timberwolves Struggling Without Their Leading Scorer - Anthony Edwards

Minnesota Timberwolves vs Charlotte Hornets Game Expectations (November 1, 2025)

Thewill once again take the court without their star player,, as they face the Charlotte Hornets on November 1, 2025. Edwards remains sidelined with a hamstring injury, an absence that continues to test Minnesota‚Äôs depth and resilience early in the season. His presence has been sorely missed, with the Timberwolves struggling to maintain consistency on both ends of the floor since his injury.Before going down, Anthony Edwards was in phenomenal form, averaging an impressive 36 points per game and emerging as one of the league‚Äôs top early MVP candidates. However, his momentum was abruptly halted after suffering a right hamstring strain during a matchup against the Indiana Pacers earlier in the season. The injury forced him to exit the game prematurely, and subsequent evaluations ruled him out for at least two weeks. The team expects him to be re-evaluated around November 9, with a potential return not anticipated before mid-November. The Timberwolves enter their second straight road game without Edwards, holding a 2-3 record. His absence has created a noticeable void in both scoring and playmaking. Head coach Chris Finch has emphasized that the team‚Äôs recent defensive lapses - particularly in perimeter rotations and closeouts - have been amplified without Anthony Edwards‚Äô two-way impact.The Timberwolves have lost a series of close contests, revealing how crucial Edwards‚Äô offensive efficiency and leadership are to the team‚Äôs success.Minnesota‚Äôs challenge tonight will be to find offensive balance while maintaining defensive discipline. Without Edwards‚Äô isolation scoring and ability to generate shots in clutch moments, the team must rely on structured half-court sets and collective execution. Julius Randle and Donte DiVincenzo are active for this matchup and are expected to lead the charge, providing scoring options and veteran experience to stabilize the lineup.Despite Edwards‚Äô absence, oddsmakers still list Minnesota as a -5.5 favorite heading into the game. This suggests confidence in the Timberwolves‚Äô roster depth and ability to adapt under pressure. The matchup against Charlotte is expected to feature a high tempo, as the Hornets boast strong offensive numbers but remain inconsistent defensively. Minnesota may look to exploit those weaknesses through transition play and inside scoring, areas where Randle and DiVincenzo could play pivotal roles.The Timberwolves continue to monitor Anthony Edwards‚Äô recovery closely, with evaluations ongoing and medical staff cautious about rushing him back too soon. His hiatus represents a major challenge for a team built around his dynamic scoring ability and leadership. As Minnesota navigates the early season without their young superstar, the priority will be maintaining competitiveness and defensive integrity until Edwards returns.Also read: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the Minnesota Timberwolves? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star‚Äôs injury report (November 1, 2025) For now, Anthony Edwards remains a confirmed absence, sidelined with a right hamstring strain, as the Timberwolves look to steady their campaign and stay afloat in the Western Conference race.

Article Title: Is Jamal Murray playing tonight? Denver Nuggets face injury setback ahead of their match against Portland Trail Blazers
Article Text:
Jamal Murray of the Denver Nuggets (Image via Getty Images)

A sudden setback stopped Jamal Murray‚Äôs speed as Denver Nuggets weighs a cautious next move

Denver is dealing with a "questionable" Jamal Murray

Jamal Murray might not play the next match (Image via NBA)

The teams are off to strong starts when the Portland Trail Blazers take on the Denver Nuggets at 10 p.m. ET on Friday. Meanwhile, Jamal Murray, the All-Star point guard for the Denver Nuggets, has continued to write a brilliant start to the 2025‚Äì26 season.However, his speed recently got halted as he was listed on the Nuggets' injury report with a doubtful tag. This is due to the soreness in his left calf before their NBA Cup game against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday night.After losing to Golden State on opening night, Denver has won three straight games, including Wednesday night's 122-88 victory. On the other hand, Portland lost their first game, but they have since won three of four games, including two in a row.Despite spending the whole last game on the bench, Murray managed to play 25 minutes, which is the fourth most of any player on the club. He struggled with the same issue in the 2024 postseason, and it was evident that it affected him when he faced a physically demanding Timberwolves team in the Conference Semifinals.Denver announced their official report to the NBA on Thursday, listing Murray as questionable with left calf tightness. The team wrote on X:‚ÄúInjury Report ahead of tomorrow's game against the Trail Blazers: PROBABLE: Cameron Johnson (Right Shoulder Inflammation) QUESTIONABLE: Jamal Murray (Left Calf Tightness) #MileHighBasketball.‚ÄùMurray has put on a number of incredible performances and averaged 27.0 points, 6.0 assists, and 4.3 rebounds for Denver in their first four games of the season. However, a recent update from the Nuggets has raised doubts about his availability for their first NBA Cup game of the year.Given that Murray's amazing start to the new season was halted by a calf injury, Denver could be better off either keeping him out of their next game completely or thinking about limiting his minutes.Murray would probably face Portland's All-Defensive Team-caliber forward Toumani Camara if he were to play for the Nuggets on Friday night. This would be a one-on-one match that would require the 28-year-old guard to put in a lot of effort and use extra force in an attempt to get open looks.Murray has averaged 27 points per game on 50/41/94 shooting splits so far this season, which is comparable to his 2023 Western Conference Finals performance against the Lakers, when he averaged 30 points.He has only averaged 15.8 points a game in October throughout his career, which is significantly lower than his numbers. He's made significant progress this season in an attempt to earn his first All-Star selection, but the much-needed momentum he's established from the start could be derailed if this injury keeps him out for a while.Injury has been a major factor, and his persistent calf problems are also a worry. Throughout his career, he has struggled with left calf pain, most notably during the 2024 NBA Playoffs. His next chance would be on Monday at home against the Sacramento Kings if he is unable to play on Friday.Also read: Portland Trail Blazers Vs Minnesota Timberwolves (10-22-2025) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, prediction, and more
Article Summary: Denver nuggets face portland trail blazers at 10 p.m. Et on friday night. All-star point guard jamal murray is listed as 'questionable' with left calf tightness. The 28-year-old has averaged 27.0 points, 6.0 assists, and 4.3 rebounds in four games.

Article Title: Vladimir Guerrero Jr reacts to Trey Yesavage dominating Game 5 with emotional message
Article Text:
Vladimir Guerrero Jr reacts to Trey Yesavage dominating Game 5 with emotional message (Image Via Getty)

‚ÄúI told him I was so proud of him,‚Äù

‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a human being. I love him. Every fifth day he comes to give it all he has, and he showed it today. He‚Äôs built for this.‚Äù

Vladimir Guerrero Jr. praises Trey Yesavage after stunning Game 5 outing

"masterclass."

Trey Yesavage opens up on staying calm before big moments

‚ÄúI saw something on Instagram that someone posted about me being locked in,‚Äù

‚ÄúBut I was just doomscrolling on TikTok and Instagram reels. I just keep it chill and try not to think about anything.‚Äù

Trey Yesavage stole the spotlight on Wednesday night, Oct. 29, 2025, at Dodger Stadium. The 22-year-old Toronto Blue Jays rookie pitched seven brilliant innings in Game 5 of the World Series, leading his team to a 6-1 win over the Los Angeles Dodgers. His calm, powerful performance helped the Blue Jays take a 3-2 series lead before heading back home to Toronto for Game 6.After the game, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. couldn‚Äôt hold back his emotions. The Blue Jays slugger praised the young pitcher with heartfelt words that melted fans‚Äô hearts.Guerrero said to reporters.Trey Yesavage‚Äôs performance in Los Angeles left everyone talking. Having given only one run, the teenage right-hander struck out twelve Dodgers hitters and pitched seven innings.His one mistake came in the third inning, when Enrique Hernandez hit a solo home run. Still, the new guy kept his cool, stayed in control, and showed confidence far over his age.Vladimir Guerrero Jr. called his fellow player's performance aEarly in the game, the Blue Jays' attack supported Yesavage; Davis Schneider hit a home run on the first pitch.Seconds later, Guerrero hit his eighth home run of the playoffs, tying Shohei Ohtani for the most home runs in this year's postseason.Ernie Clement offered a sacrifice fly in the fourth inning; Toronto added additional runs in the seventh to finish off the victory.Yesavage's serenity on the hill and Guerrero's direction in the batting order gave the Blue Jays a superb combination of seasoned and youthful players.Both ESPN and The Guardian applauded the rookie for delivering one of the finest postseason pitching efforts of the year.In an interview with ESPN‚Äôs Jeff Passan after Game 5, Trey Yesavage shared how he stays relaxed before huge games.Yesavage said, laughing.Also Read: Why Did Alex Rodriguez Apologize To Shohei Ohtani While David Ortiz Questioned The Dodgers‚Äô World Series Spirit? Even though his Major League debut won't be till September 2025, Yesavage is currently breaking history in the playoffs. He is 3-1 in five playoff games with a 3.46 ERA.Should the Los Angeles Dodgers demand a Game 7, the rookie might be back for relief duty. Yesavage and the Blue Jays hope to finish the job in front of their home fans on Friday, October 31, 2025, at Rogers Center, for now.
Article Summary: Vladimir guerrero jr. praised trey yesavage after stunning game 5 outing. The 22-year-old toronto blue jays rookie pitched seven brilliant innings in game 5 of the world series, leading his team to a 6-1 win over the los angeles dodgers.

Article Title: "No one should fuc**ng be me for Halloween": Kylie Kelce warns fans sternly while Jason Kelce breaks down her signature style
Article Text:
Kylie Kelce draws the line for Halloween impersonators.

Kylie Kelce sets the rules while Jason Kelce shares ultimate Halloween costume guide



How Jason handles being mistaken for travis

Kelce humor keeps fans engaged beyond football

Also read:

Halloween is approaching, but Kylie Kelce isn‚Äôt here for fans dressing up as her. On the latest episode of her ‚ÄúNot Gonna Lie‚Äù podcast, the podcaster made it very clear that impersonating her isn‚Äôt on the menu this year. Kylie‚Äôs message was blunt, humorous, and unmistakable ‚Äî fans need to steer clear if they were planning to make her their costume inspiration. ‚ÄúI just need to say no one should fuc**ng be me for Halloween. That's a ridiculous costume, and you need to cut that sh*t out. Go ahead. So, now tell them how to not do it,‚Äù Kylie said during the podcast, setting strict but playful rules.Jason Kelce, former Eagles center and Kylie‚Äôs husband, joined the conversation and gave his own take, offering practical advice for anyone attempting to capture Kylie‚Äôs look without going overboard. He walked listeners through the key elements: leggings or sweatpants, a hoodie, glasses, and maybe a baseball cap if needed. ‚ÄúUm, some type of hoodie. Yeah, if you haven't put in your contacts, glasses. Perfect. Maybe a baseball hat. It's pretty much it,‚Äù Jason explained.Kylie agreed, joking that Jason ‚Äúnailed it,‚Äù and added that glasses were the finishing touch to perfect the outfit. ‚ÄúYou're good,‚Äù she said, confirming that was all fans really needed if they insisted on paying homage.Beyond Halloween costumes, Kylie also shared insight into Jason‚Äôs calm reaction when people confuse him with his younger brother, Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce . Instead of reacting with frustration, Jason handles it with patience. "That's like when people used to ask my husband, they'd be like, 'Aren't you Travis Kelce?' They would accidentally slip up on the wrong brother. And he would be like, 'Nah, it's not me.' I mean, that's it. That's all he would give them. And I'm like, 'I can't even fault you cuz you didn't lie.' Wasn't rude. It's not him," Kylie recalled.This playful back-and-forth comes just a week after Kylie poked fun at Jason in a joking Instagram post. Their podcast and social media content stay light, relatable, and entertaining, giving fans a peek behind the scenes of their lives. Blending football culture with everyday humor, the Kelces‚Äô candid chats show that even NFL pros and podcasters have fun, family moments, and playful banter off the field.
Article Summary: Kylie kelce said halloween impersonators need to "cut that sh*t out" jason kelce offered practical advice for anyone attempting to capture kylie‚Äôs look without going overboard. The kelces‚Äô podcast and social media content stay light, relatable, and entertaining.

Article Title: Luke Kwon slammed as old 2019 article resurfaces after Barstool Sports golfer misses tee time again
Article Text:
Luke Kwon slammed as old 2019 article resurfaces after Barstool Sports golfer misses tee time again (Image via Getty)

Luke Kwon‚Äôs old NBC Sports story shows past struggles with being on time



Luke Kwon responds to backlash after Internet Invitational mix-up

YouTuber and golf influencer Luke Kwon faced major online backlash after he missed his tee time at Barstool Sports‚Äô Internet Invitational at Grayhawk Golf Club in Scottsdale, Arizona. Kwon was supposed to start his round at 9:30 a.m., but arrived late. While Dave Portnoy, founder of Barstool Sports, allowed him to play with a penalty, fans criticized Kwon for being unprofessional.Soon after, a 2019 NBC Sports article about his college golf days at the University of Oklahoma resurfaced online, revealing that Kwon had struggled with lateness and discipline issues in the past. The story, shared by Tee Times (@TeeTimesPub), showed that Kwon almost got kicked off the Oklahoma Sooners golf team because he often missed workouts and classes.After Kwon missed his tee time at the Internet Invitational, golf fans on social media began sharing a 2019 NBC Sports article about his college career. The story, written by NBC Sports‚Äô Carson Williams, talked about Kwon‚Äôs early struggles after joining the Oklahoma Sooners golf program.According to the report, Kwon ‚Äúoften wouldn‚Äôt wake up in time for workouts, practice, or class.‚Äù His coach, Ryan Hybl, almost removed him from the team for his lack of discipline but decided to keep him because he was the ‚Äúglue guy‚Äù for the Sooners.The post from @TeeTimesPub gained attention on X, with fans calling out how Kwon‚Äôs college habits seemed to show up again at the recent tournament. One user wrote, ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a Sooner. Makes total sense now,‚Äù while another joked, ‚ÄúIronically, he was a‚Ä¶ sooner.‚ÄùAfter the backlash, Luke Kwon posted a message on his Instagram Stories, saying it was an honest mistake. He wrote:‚ÄúJust woke up what‚Äôd I miss. Obviously, nobody sleeps through their alarm wanting to sleep through their alarm. S*** happened and I am genuinely sorry, honest mistake. I‚Äôve already apologized to Portnoy, Bob and the boys off camera at the event. Good for content tho.‚ÄùAlso Read: Andrew Tate Becomes New Misfits Boxing CEO After Old KSI Tweet Leads To Explosive Company Takeover Despite the jokes and trolling, many fans appreciated his honest apology. Others still pointed out how the 2019 article showed a pattern of lateness.Luke Kwon, born in Seoul, South Korea, and raised in Oklahoma, is part of the Good Good Golf YouTube group, which has more than 1.98 million subscribers. His own channel has over 392,000 subscribers, where he regularly posts golf content and collaborations.
Article Summary: Luke kwon missed his tee time at barstool sports‚Äô internet invitational in scottsdale, arizona. He was supposed to start his round at 9:30 a.m. but arrived late. A 2019 nbc sports article about his college golf days at the university of oklahoma resurfaced online, revealing that kwon had struggled with lateness and discipline issues in the past.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: New Jersey Devils could move goaltender Nico Daws amid roster pressure
Article Text:
Nico Daws of the New Jersey Devils (Credit: Getty Images)

NHL trade rumors grow around New Jersey Devils‚Äô Nico Daws



Jacob Markstrom‚Äôs return adds uncertainty to the Devils‚Äô goaltending plan



Possible trade destinations and scenarios for Nico Daws



The New Jersey Devils are once again making headlines in the latest NHL trade rumors, this time surrounding young goaltender Nico Daws. After a string of sharp performances, Daws has proven he‚Äôs ready for consistent NHL action; however, with veterans Jacob Markstrom and Jake Allen also in the mix, the Devils face a difficult roster decision as the season progresses.The challenge for New Jersey lies in roster management and waiver rules. Once Daws crosses the 30-day or 10-game threshold at the NHL level, he‚Äôll require waivers to be reassigned to the AHL. Losing a promising 24-year-old goaltender for nothing would be a setback, making a mid-season trade a realistic option for general manager Tom Fitzgerald.Nico Daws‚Äô steady play has not gone unnoticed by scouts across the league. His recent outing against the Minnesota Wild showed poise and confidence under pressure. Further fueling speculation that the Devils might use his value in trade discussions, NHL insiders believe multiple teams are monitoring his situation. Particularly those struggling with goalie depth or injuries early in the season.The return of Jacob Markstrom from injury could significantly impact how the Devils handle their goaltending trio, Markstrom‚Äôs veteran presence and Jake Allen‚Äôs experience make it challenging to keep all three goaltenders on the roster, and with the Devils pushing for playoff positioning.Now, Daws could be the odd man out unless a suitable trade emerges.Teams like the Vegas Golden Knights and Ottawa Senators. The Buffalo Sabres could be interested if their goalie depth weakens. A trade involving Daws might bring back a young forward or a mid-round pick. For now, New Jersey seems patient, but if the market heats up, expect calls to start soon.Also Read: Latest update on former Anaheim Ducks star Ryan Kesler‚Äôs criminal sexual conduct allegations
Article Summary: The new jersey devils are once again making headlines in the latest nhl trade rumors, this time surrounding young goaltender nico daws. After a string of sharp performances, daws has proven he's ready for consistent nhl action. The challenge for new jersey lies in roster management and waiver rules.

Article Title: Texas Longhorns superfan Scott Wilson dies at 74 after never missing a game in 25 years
Article Text: Devoted Texas Longhorns fan Scott Wilson, 74, passed away Friday. An Austin lawyer and proud UT alum, Wilson was hospitalized in Florida after a medical emergency while traveling to a game. He hadn't missed a Texas baseball game in over 25 years and was planning to attend his 595th consecutive football game.
Article Summary: Scott wilson was hospitalized in florida after a medical emergency while traveling to a game. He hadn't missed a texas baseball game in over 25 years and was planning to attend his 595th consecutive football game. Wilson was an austin lawyer and proud ut alum.

Article Title: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs unfair‚Äù: Connor McDavid sparks debate after dismissing Kirill Kaprizov contract comparisons and taking less money to stay with Oilers
Article Text:
Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid has signed a new contract. He chose a deal that keeps his salary lower than he could have earned. This decision allows the team more money to sign other players. McDavid expressed his view that elite hockey players should earn more. His focus remains on winning championships for Edmonton.

Connor McDavid calls contract comparisons with Kaprizov ‚Äúunfair‚Äù

Connor McDavid prioritizes winning over wealth in Edmonton

Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid made it clear he isn‚Äôt interested in being part of any salary comparison talk, especially after signing his latest extension. The three-time Hart Trophy winner recently agreed to a two-year deal worth $12.5 million annually, keeping him among the NHL‚Äôs highest-paid players. But when conversations shifted toward Minnesota Wild forward Kirill Kaprizov ‚Äôs massive eight-year, $136 million contract, McDavid brushed off the comparisons.Known for his laser focus on performance rather than paychecks, the Oilers star emphasized that money doesn‚Äôt define his career goals or commitment to Edmonton. For McDavid, it‚Äôs about championships, not contract sizes,another reminder that his mindset remains firmly on winning, not competing in the league‚Äôs financial spotlight.Speaking to The Athletic, Connor McDavid made it clear that each player‚Äôs situation is unique. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs two completely different situations,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs unfair for people to say a bad thing about anybody. Everybody who plays in this league earns it. Everybody who makes money in this league earns that. It‚Äôs different situations, different cap situations, different teams, different constructs.‚ÄùRather than chasing the biggest paycheck, McDavid chose stability with a purpose.His short-term deal gives Edmonton flexibility ‚Äî a rare move for a player of his caliber. While many expected the league‚Äôs most dominant forward to cash in with a long-term deal, McDavid‚Äôs focus wasn‚Äôt on personal gain but on helping the Oilers finally reach their Stanley Cup goal.McDavid‚Äôs decision comes after back-to-back Stanley Cup Final losses, leaving him determined to finish what he started. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not a hard calculation to figure out,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúObviously, the feeling was I was going to get some raise. The money they‚Äôve gotten back is money they can go spend. That was the feeling.‚ÄùTeammates have taken notice of his leadership. Defenseman Darnell Nurse praised the captain‚Äôs selflessness, saying, ‚ÄúHe left a lot of money on the table. For us as a team, it shows how much he wants to win and his willingness to sacrifice for the group. That‚Äôs your captain leading by example.‚ÄùMcDavid‚Äôs extension may only run through 2028, but it sends a clear message Edmonton‚Äôs championship window is open now, and their leader is all in.Also Read: How Connor McDavid and Lauren Kyle quietly became hockey‚Äôs answer to Tom Brady and Gisele B√ºndchen
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid recently signed a two-year contract extension worth $12.5 million annually. Mcdavid called comparisons to kirill kaprizov's eight-year, $136 million contract "unfair" the edmonton oilers captain said he wants to win championships, not paychecks.
